quote: Don't waste your energy on being angry at something that somebody did six months ago or a year ago. It's over. – Joan Rivers
fact: Since 1978, 37 people have died by Vending Machine`s falling on them.  13 people are killed annually.  All this while trying to shake merchandise out of them. 113 people have been injured.
joke: Why does Superman get invited to dinners? Because he is a Supperhero.
